divs: Sighting DetailsI awoke when the cat jumped to a start at1:45 am on a Wednesday morning. He was looking up and out the window at an enormous triangle craft gliding by (only see the underside). It was covered entirely on the underside with white and blue white lights . ( hundreds).It continued in its way , making no sound until it disappeared from view. It seemed to be very low. When I awoke in the morning it had carved a huge path through the clouds. It had moved in a straight line from the southwest to the northeast, over my building. I was shocked at the enormous size of the craft,could have fit many, many commercial jets in this triangle. It completely blocked out two 23 inch windows as it went by.
Summary: lying in bed observed large triangle moving silently southwest to northeast, blocking out two 23inch windows as it glided by
trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around June 15th 2013
